APIKey.description: Unique identifier used for authentication purposes

PaysTax.description: Indicator if the organisation is required to pay taxes

Version.description: Version information related to the organisation data

BaseCurrency.description: The default currency used by the organisation

IsDemoCompany.description: Indicator if the organisation is a demo company

RegistrationNumber.description: Official registration number of the organisation

TaxNumber.description: Tax identification number of the organisation

FinancialYearEndDay.description: Day of the financial year end

FinancialYearEndMonth.description: Month of the financial year end

SalesTaxBasis.description: Basis on which sales tax is calculated

SalesTaxPeriod.description: Period for which sales tax is applicable

PeriodLockDate.description: Date and time marking the period lock

EndOfYearLockDate.description: Date and time marking the end-of-year lock

CreatedDateUTC.description: Date and time when the organisation was created

OrganisationEntityType.description: Type or category of the organisation entity

ShortCode.description: Short code or abbreviation of the organisation name

LineOfBusiness.description: Field describing the primary business of the organisation

Addresses.description: List of addresses associated with the organisation

Phones.description: List of phone numbers associated with the organisation

ExternalLinks.description: List of external links associated with the organisation

LinkType.description: Type or category of the external link
